Container.Name: Luma
Container.Overview: Luma is a modern, fully self-hosted personal library management system with built-in e-reader and audiobook player. Supports EPUB, PDF, MOBI, CBZ, CBR for books and M4B, MP3, M4A for audiobooks. Features include progress tracking, collections, bookmarks, highlights, annotations, automatic metadata extraction, multi-user authentication, and a beautiful interface. Uses local SQLite database - no external database required. All settings can be configured within the application.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Web interface port - this is where you access Luma

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Directory for all Luma data including database, books, audiobooks, and covers. This MUST be mapped to preserve your data across updates.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions (99 = nobody on Unraid)

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions (100 = users on Unraid)

Config.Name: Google Books API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) For book recommendations. Can also be set in app Settings.

Config.Name: SendGrid API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) For Send to Kindle/Email. Can also be set in app Settings.

Config.Name: Resend API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) Alternative to SendGrid. Can also be set in app Settings.
